content: interweave sku ep0816 available for free in 2 different e-books from interweave 5 free patterns for crochet learn how to cross stitch on crochet make a crochet edging and other techniques for embellishing crochet and https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/crochet-cable-stitch-guide-4-free-patterns--crochet-cables-tutorial 1 **pattern description from interweave online store ** inspired by flower vines growing up a chain-link fence in late summer this pretty and sturdy bag holds all you need for a day out or an evening of fun for those who haven t yet made crochet cables this bag is a good project to learn on **finished size ** 16 wide across base 9½ wide across top opening and 15 tall **yarn ** reynolds soft sea worsted 100% wool 77 yd 70 m /1¾ oz 50 g cyca-standard yarn weight system-4 #9213 light grey mc 6 skeins #9321 plum a 2 skeins #9652 olive green b 1 skein yarn distributed by jca **yarn weight ** #4 - medium **gauge ** 13 single_crochet and 15 row = 4 with smaller hook **needles/hooks ** sizes h/8 5 mm and i/9 5 5 mm adjust hook sizes if necessary to obtain the correct gauge **notions ** yarn needle purse handles 8 ½ yd fabric for lining optional magnetic snap closure optional sharp sewing needle and matching thread optional originally published *interweave crochet fall 2007* 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/crochet-cable-stitch-guide-4-free-patterns--crochet-cables-tutorial
